name: @thinkmill/fta-tariff-formula
description: Library for representing and reasoning about tariff formulas.

scripts.grammar: jison src/grammar.jison -o .grammar.js -m commonjs && grep -v token_stack .grammar.js | grep -v source > grammar.js
